page.title: 15SCHOOL LOG (2)
page.content: and mufflers for the Red Cross. 1924 Today received 1st Wireless Lesson 1934...Milk for Schoolchildren scheme was introduced..A halfpenny is charged for 1/3 pint of milk. 1936...School and Schoolhouse water systems have been connected to the Rur- al District Council Water main. 1939 On books 70 children, of which 48 are Benington children, 14 are children who are evacuated under L.C.C. scheme & 8 are children who have come to stay with friends or relatives. 1944 All Seniors have gone to Watton. This is now a Junior & Infant School. 1954 New Classroom & Kitchen built. 1972 Children to no longer use front playground but can play safely on large area at back. 1973 Building of extension now prog- ressing quickly.
